txt.en: This report is written in the messy scrawl of an Orc.

Hail, Mazog, Lord of the Pit and Ruler of the Caves! The bearer of this communication has been proven in  battle, his strength measured among the very highest of my warriors. I gift him to your service in token of  the friendship of the Orcs of Mirkwood.

I here affix the mark of Maufulug. May we meet in battle beneath the yellow leaves some day soon, and share a cup and stories of death and glory!
